feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [LIM1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack L102A11 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 20, 02:00 - 03:00 UTC

Feb 20, 16:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal offer, affecting servers in rack L102A11.

Start time : 20/03/2026 02:00 UTC
End time : 20/03/2026 03:00 UTC
Service impact : Public network will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for servers in L102A11.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA2][Cooling System] - Rack G202A14 maintenance notification
entry.content:

Completed - The maintenance won’t be completed in scheduled time.
It has been postponed and will be rescheduled.
A new post will be created when the new schedule has been validated.

Feb 20, 21:06 UTC
Update - This maintenance is still in progress. Below you can find the new end time of the operation.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

End time : 23/02/2026 17:30 UTC
